Woodruff Papers Scripture Matches

Matches per volume

Code 
from IPython.display import Markdown
from tabulate import tabulate
import pandas as pd

number_of_rows = 50
path_mathes = "../Woodruff Papers Scripture Matching/data/data_matches_temporary.csv"
top_matches = pd.read_csv(path_mathes).sort_values(by='cosine_score',ascending=False)

matches_counts = top_matches.groupby(['volume_title']).count().reset_index()[['volume_title', 'phrase_woodruff']]
matches_counts
def create_markdown_table(path_mathes, condition, number_of_rows):
  data = top_matches.query(condition).reset_index(drop=True)
  markdown_table = Markdown(tabulate(
    data.head(number_of_rows),
    headers=list(data)
  ))
  return markdown_table

# match count/volume
Markdown(tabulate(
  matches_counts,
  headers=list(matches_counts)
))
volume_title phrase_woodruff
0 Book of Mormon 37
1 Doctrine and Covenants 141
2 New Testament 59
3 Old Testament 65
4 Pearl of Great Price 14
